basics.name: Tan Yuan Xiang Elroy
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I’m Elroy, a 21-year-old guy on a journey of self-discovery through the exciting worlds of IT and engineering. Currently calling Singapore home, I’m taking a detour from the typical academic path to explore and develop myself before diving into SUTD for a diploma.

work.name: Singapore Polytechnic
work.position: Sustainable Mushroom Farming with AIoT Technology project Intern
work.summary:
Collaborated with a team of seven to conceptualize and design an autonomous urban farming system dedicated to cultivating mushrooms.


Took charge of leading a sub-team of four members in the design phase of a shipping container.


This container was developed to monitor and control growth parameters, optimizing the conditions for an efficient mushroom harvest.


Concurrently, held responsibility for overseeing all hardware aspects while integrating software seamlessly into the system.

awards.title: Diploma with Merit
awards.summary: Top 10% of each graduating course cohort
